notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: L.P.O.W. contributed to the conception of the paper, data request, analysis and interpretation, drafting of the paper and subsequent revisions. J.W.H. contributed to the statistical methodology and approach, data analysis, interpretation of the data, and revision of the paper. O.G. contributed to the conception of the paper, statistical methodology and approach, data analysis, interpretation of the data, and revision of the paper. R.W. contributed to the conception of the paper, drafting of the paper, interpretation of the data and revision of the paper with a focus on the policy relevance and timeliness. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
